test-results.name: OpenTofu Lab Automation - Bulletproof Quick Tests

test-suite.name: OpenTofu Lab Automation - Bulletproof Quick Tests

test-case.description: Should exit gracefully with helpful message when no scripts specified
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should exit gracefully with helpful message when no scripts specified

failure.message: Expected 'Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts' to be found in collection @('[2025-06-19 20:04:34.949] [SUCCESS] [Initialize-Loggin...] Logging system initialized', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.026] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Core runner started', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.029] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Loading configuration from: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.043] [SUCCESS] [core-runner.ps1 ] Starting OpenTofu Lab Automation Core Runner', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.045] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Repository root: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.047] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Configuration file: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.049] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Verbosity level: detailed', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.058] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Found 38 scripts', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.060] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts', '[2025-06-19 20:04:35.062] [WARN ] [core-runner.ps1 ] No scripts specified for non-interactive execution', ...2 more), but it was not found.
failure.stack-trace: at $result.Output | Should -Contain "Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts", /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/tests/unit/modules/CoreApp/NonInteractiveMode.Tests.ps1:123 at <ScriptBlock>, /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/tests/unit/modules/CoreApp/NonInteractiveMode.Tests.ps1:123

test-case.description: Should respect verbosity levels in non-interactive mode
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should respect verbosity levels in non-interactive mode

failure.message: Expected the actual value to be less than 12, but got 12.
